DOC.HEADLINE: IOWA POLITICIAN , STUDENT CHARGED IN FISH TALE
DOC.TEXT: A local politician and a high_school student were charged Thursday with trying to steal $ 10 # 000 in prize_money from a charity fishing tournament by lying_about who caught the prize-winning fish . Scott Allen , 18 , paid a $ 15 registration fee along with 800 other anglers and appeared to have reeled in a specially tagged walleye on May 8 . But the Iowa Great Lakes Chamber_of_Commerce said it discovered that Ron Sears , a Spencer , Iowa , city councilman who was not registered , actually caught the walleye and gave it to Allen .
